messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Want to stay alive? Suit Sensors to max!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: AI, don't forget about that advertising! We need cash moolah quick, baby.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Our sponsers are DROPPING us, Terry. C'mon, my man.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ai we still need that advertisement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unidentified armed ship detected near the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Data theft signal detected, source registered on local gps units.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to the recent events, we've transferred our COMPLETELY useless pirate defense fund into cash that was then used to deck the AI core out with vending machines. You're welcome.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Get ready, pirates.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I gave the Poly to them. Do not harm the pirates!!!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Even when being raided. don't forget about advertisements!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telec#MCi46:5.;@63-BZZZZT

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: How do you like the new Shuttle Co Shuttle? Shuttles with care!
